overview: Don Beagle is your everyday, hard-working guy. When he and his team are sent to prison for money laundering, Don finds himself living in a cell with Simeon, a cannibal who also happens to be...a zombie? Follow Don as he begins to develop feelings toward Simeon and struggles with his preconceived notions of human-zombie romance in this captivating story of love, passion, and the undead.
tagline: A zombie prison rom-com for the ages
title: Love Undead
